Definition: Given an English language product review, your task is to determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the review has a positive tone. A bad review is one where the review has a negative tone.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: Excellent Product! Fits the screen of my ipad very nice!! Will purchase more for my family. Nice bright colors. I would certainly recommend this product. Product is well made and was received within a few days. Thank you.

This product only worked for a couple of weeks, and then stopped working at my apartment in Philadelphia. The adapter is rated up to 100 amps, which means most home appliances would probably be fine, but it did not work fine with mine. When I plug these into the wall,it started off as a trickle charge, almost like plugging something in. Then even though that was happening, It wouldn't stop charging my cell, ipad, or ipod until all three items were fully recharged. Very disappointed.

This is not a review. It needs to be because the only reason I purchased this disc was out of frustration with my own music playing in my car. And it seems others have suffered from similar frustration. The CD is just like all other MP3 sound quality. Nothing too bad at loud volume, but if you want something that doesn't get annoying every half hour, then don't buy it. The CD has way less volume than I would like. A lot less noticeable on first listen, then almost imperceptible after it.

The book contains some good and interesting tips, like the tip to cut away from a big restaurant in order not get served up something bad (I have tried this, though never felt so ashamed after making the choice that leads you to do so). I even learned about different options for eating food without meat. But sometimes it takes much more than tips to convince me to eat something. To read this book, you'll need an open mind, too.

My only problem with this book was some of the stories were not accurate. One story had a boy in high school trying to run away from home into adulthood by becoming an FBI agent and making millions in Hollywood. His wife got pregnant but he did not. There are many more that could have been mentioned on how his real mother never really existed or if she even existed. He lived under someone else's name for years then remarried after divorcing twice. Also, the names given in the book where different.

I ordered this book for a class and was not very pleased that my favorite poem was, by far the least, in it. The poems were great but there is only so many of them. For students who want the poetry as well buy this, because that's what they need. If you need everything don't order!

This film was a waste of $10.00 and that is too cheap. I didn't expect to be thrilled or entertained, but rather a movie for my daughter about how God has given us special talents within us. She would not understand all this drivel, even if it were a movie. As many times as we watched the movie, she kept saying "Daddy, what's happening?" What am I? How do these things change over time? If someone can explain more on this, it will help me.

Although these headphones have a great battery and long working life it does not take advantage of the ipod as well as others. The fit is good on me (women's size) however they still fall out easily even when used under my hair.
